Name: Qiskit
Description: Open-source SDK for quantum computing at the level of pulses, circuits, and algorithms.

Name: Braket
Description: Fully managed quantum computing service for building quantum algorithms.

Name: Cirq
Description: Framework for creating, editing, and invoking Noisy Intermediate Scale Quantum (NISQ) circuits.

Name: Forest
Description: Rigetti’s software library for writing, simulating, compiling and executing quantum programs.

Name: PennyLane
Description: Cross-platform library for quantum computing, machine learning, and chemistry.

Name: Ocean
Description: D-Wave’s Ocean SDK for solving real-world problems with quantum and hybrid solutions.

Name: OpenQL
Description: Open-source quantum programming language for quantum hardware.

Name: ProjectQ
Description: Open-source software framework for quantum computing.

Name: Silq
Description: High-level programming language for quantum computing.

Name: Strawberry Fields
Description: Full-stack library for designing, simulating, and optimizing quantum optical circuits.

Name: staq
Description: Compiler and optimizer for quantum circuits.

Name: JKQ-DDSIM
Description: Quantum circuit simulator based on decision diagrams.

Name: Liqui|>
Description: Microsoft's software architecture and tools for quantum computing.

Name: QuSpin
Description: Library for simulating quantum many-body systems.

Name: QuTiP
Description: Quantum Toolbox in Python for simulating quantum systems.
